description: Create a new SignalR service and update an exiting SignalR service.

parameters.description: Parameters for the create or update operation

subscription_id.description: Gets subscription Id which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

resource_name.description: The name of the SignalR resource.

location.description: Azure GEO region: e.g. West US | East US | North Central US | South Central US | West Europe | North Europe | East Asia | Southeast Asia | etc. The geo region of a resource never changes after it is created.

sku.description: The billing information of the resource.(e.g. basic vs. standard)

properties.description: Settings used to provision or configure the resource

tags.description: A list of key value pairs that describe the resource.
